description: Close view of Döbeln’s aide-de-camp standing beside the bed, awaiting orders. His uniform is neat but dusted from travel. Behind him, the young messenger hesitates at the doorway, holding a sealed letter. The air feels tense, as if the war itself presses into the small room.
narration: Messages from the front — every word from Döbeln carries the weight of command.
info: Page 4 – Döbeln Sick in Nykarleby. PageType: Quad (4 panels). Scene (panel 2): aide and messenger await Döbeln’s instructions in the dim quarters.
